title: Reference Generator
description: Generate code based on existing patterns from your reference projects

select.title: Select Reference
select.description: Choose a reference project to base your generation on
select.subtitle: Choose an existing reference project or add a new one

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.description: Upload or write your new requirements
requirements.subtitle: Provide the requirements for the new feature you want to generate

mapping.title: Entity Mapping
mapping.description: Configure how entities should be transformed
mapping.subtitle: Map reference entities to new names for your generated code

generate.title: Generate
generate.subtitle: Watch as your code is generated based on the reference patterns

result.title: Results
result.subtitle: Review the generated code and apply it to your project

addReferenceDescription: Load a folder containing reference code, SQL schemas, and requirements
